patthana14.23:1.1_0: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.23:2.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana14.23:3.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.23:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
patthana14.23:5.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.23:6.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.23:7.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana14.23:7.1_1: cittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana14.23:7.1_2: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana14.23:7.1_3: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana14.23:7.1_4: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.23:8.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.23:9.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.23:10.1_0: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.23:11.1_0: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.23:12.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.23:13.1_0: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.23:14.1_0: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.23:15.1_0: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.23:16.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana14.23:17.1_0: Upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.23:18.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.23:19.1_0: Upādinnañca anupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.23:20.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe…
